original_title: Standing In The Blink Of A Night: For Casey Goodson Jr.
overview: A visual that places you ground level on the night an entire city rallied behind the family of Casey Goodson Jr., who was killed by the hands of law enforcement in our very own city, Columbus, Ohio. Capturing a wide range of emotions, it paints a picture of how Casey Goodson impacted the life of those around him, and how his legacy is ushering in the tools of change as a result, due to the unfortunate circumstances surrounding his death.
title: Standing In The Blink Of A Night: For Casey Goodson Jr.
